name: Component-contribution
tagline: Standard reaction Gibbs energy estimation for biochemical reactions
body:
### Welcome to the GitHub repository for the Component Contribution method
This repository hosts the most up-to-date version of component contribution for Python and Matlab. Please treat this code as alpha, since no real versioning is being done. If you wish to have a clean and simple interface with stable Gibbs energy estimations, please try [eQuilibrator](http://equilibrator.weizmann.ac.il/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
